```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
fileStorage <- "C:\\Users\\lochl\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\Sawfly Lab\\ASD\\2022\\Leaf\\LB\\DC2.5.5.22\\Processed\\"

fileNames <- list.files(fileStorage)

filePrefix = function(files,prefixes) {
  output <- paste(prefixes,files,sep = "")
  return(output)
}

newFileNames <- filePrefix(fileNames,"x")

file.rename(paste0(fileStorage,fileNames),
            paste0(fileStorage,newFileNames))

```
